description:
Job Title: Junior Event Coordinator

Company: Think Tell Junction

Location: Los Angeles, CA

Job Type: Full-Time (40 hours per week)

Salary: $47,560 to $53,600 per year

About Us: At Think Tell Junction, we understand the significance of staying connected in today's fast-paced world. We are thrilled to welcome you to a realm where communication transcends boundaries, and every conversation is an enriching experience. Join our innovative team and be a part of a company that values creativity, collaboration, and the power of effective communication.

Job Description: We are looking for an organized and enthusiastic Junior Event Coordinator to join our team. In this role, you will assist in the planning and execution of various events, ranging from corporate conferences to community outreach programs. This position is perfect for someone who is passionate about event management and is eager to grow their career in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist in the planning and coordination of events, including logistics, scheduling, and vendor management.
  • Collaborate with team members to develop event concepts and themes that align with the company’s objectives.
  • Manage event timelines and ensure all deadlines are met.
  • Coordinate with vendors, venues, and other stakeholders to ensure successful event execution.
  • Support the marketing team in promoting events through social media, email campaigns, and other channels.
  • Assist in the preparation of event materials, such as invitations, agendas, and promotional items.
  • Provide on-site support during events to ensure everything runs smoothly.
  • Collect feedback from attendees and assist in post-event analysis.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Event Management, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Creative problem-solving abilities and a proactive attitude.
  • Familiarity with event management software and tools is a plus.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Flexibility to work occasional evenings and weekends as needed.


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary ranging from $47,560 to $53,600 per year.
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance.
  • Paid time off and holidays.
  • Professional development and growth opportunities.
  • Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
  • Employee wellness programs.


Join Think Tell Junction and help us create events that connect, inspire, and leave a lasting impact. Apply now and become part of a team that values creativity, innovation, and the power of communication.

We look forward to hearing from you!
